comments.text:
+Mateus Guedes Mazeiro  e Gabiel Castro.  Só pra constar:  é possivel 
transformar qualquer Lancer em um esportivo com itens originais e sem 
perder qualquer garantia da Mitsubishi. O motor é o mesmo, com alguns 
incrementos claro, itens de segurança por exemplo, pois senão é poste na 
certa.

http://www.mitsufans.com/t2309-elaboracao-e-montagem-do-kit-turbo-lancer-mt-projeto-tipo-evo-by-tecnobox
.
comments.author: Antonio José Gundim Junior

comments.text:
+Antonio José Gundim Junior​ não tem diferencial com deslizamento limitado, 
o câmbio é cvt e do EVO é dupla embreagem, carroceria com mais rolagem, 
suspensão diferente, freios, e deve ter mais umas coisinhas.
comments.author: Mateus Guedes Mazeiro

comments.text:
+Gabriel Castro vc sabe o que o Lancer AWD ou Gt tem a menos que o evo? 
Somente motor?

casa e vi o outdoor da Mitsubishi, dizendo "lancer a partir de 67.990"
comments.author: Pedro H. Magno

comments.text:
O Evolution X Custa 215 mil aproximadamente mas o Lancer comum (com 160 cv) 
custa 70 mil (a partir de) e acho q deve ser uma boa compra sim. Esperando 
o vídeo do camaro que custa 222 e com 406 cv de potencia.
comments.author: Gabriel Castro

comments.text:
+Luke Daywalker Bmw M1 você não consegue por preço, quem sabe o 1 M usado 
com um preço camarada pra ter um pouco mais abaixo q o evo X.
comments.author: Mateus Guedes Mazeiro

comments.text:
+Luke Daywalker APzão!? kkkk
Pra colocar na pista não basta motor fuçado amigo, e é por isso que o Evo é 
caro. Não to dizendo que vale o que custa, porque no brasil nada vale o que 
custa. Mas você não pode pensar só em cavalaria quando fala de um carro 
para pista.
Pode pegar um "APzão" com o dobro de potência que não anda junto NUNCA. 
Isso se aguentar uma bateria toda em WOT.
comments.author: Leandro Daminelli

comments.text:
+Evo X por 200 mil comprava um carro e preparava ele. Um subaru impreza 
preparado deve custar menos que isso. Um BMW m1 ou um Mercedes com algumas 
melhorias já devem dar conta do recado. Fora os apzão da vida que dão uma 
boa receita e são mais baratos. Mas convenhamos que 200 mil é um valor meio 
surreal para este carro mesmo com uma embreagem boa e potencia de 295 cv 
não vale tudo isso. Talvez se usasse um motor v6 ou um 6 em linha seria um 
carro muito top.
comments.author: Luke Daywalker

comments.text:
Melhores e mais baratos ? Cite  alguns exemplos  ,Evo X tem cambio de dupla 
embreagem , 4x4  ,com preparação básica vira tempo de RS6,AUDI R8 V10 nas 
pistas
comments.author: Evo X

captions.text: Today in "Fast Lap" we have a car who is playing at home
The Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution X
The Lancer Cup, which is a category of Brazil, races here in Velo Città
Pure blood from racing
4 times world champion in WRC, what can we expect?
I heard very good things about this car
I'm looking forward to test
Some say that is one of the best gearboxes
The most intelligent gearbox in terms of give what the driver needs
So, let's go
Let's see how it works in the chronometer
Well, now we are in a Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution X
A car which have a good historic of competition
This car was selected by great champions and won a lot of events
WRC in the 90's
Speed rallying, have you ever risked in your career?
No, never
For me, rally
When some people say "all the drivers are crazy"
No, actually we have levels of madness
I know where I will crash at least
The guy who races in Rally don't know where he will crash
The only rally that I've took part was in Campos do Jordão
I was the number 3
They gave us some minutes between one driver and the other
I had to be on the starting line at 7:15am
But I've been warned in that day that I had to be there in that time
I was having breakfast
I arrived and the guys: "Go, go, go"
But I asked: "Which kind of rally is?"
The guy said: "I don't know, go, go, go"
And I was overtaking a lot of people
I thought: "I'll win"
At the first place that I stoped, I knew that it was a regularity rallying
And I was going very fast
I said: "No, thanks"
I went back home, because we were going too slow
This gearbox comes in the hand
With the slick tyre we can see
The car did what is called 'four wheel drift'
He escaped with the four wheels
He is very well balanced, but we are over the speed of the car
So, the car just goes wide
Fisically is impossible to keep the car in the corner
I loved, I wanna go home with this car!
Escapes progressively, giving you confidence
Yeah
The people here were betting that this car could be one of the fastest
He won't be as fast as the Jaguar
But will be close
Let's see?
"Fast Lap with Rubens Barrichello"
This car have a very good speed
Turns very well
Even with less 250hp compared with the Jaguar
The Evo showed that is very fast
Being just 3s slower than the F-Type
Car very balanced and you hear the noise changing gears
I loved the way that is balanced
This tire is little bit more used, so a little bit more slick
In the concept of less rubber
So is good
It's a very well balanced car
I'm sure that I will go home with this one

title: MITSUBISHI LANCER EVO X - VOLTA RÁPIDA #2 COM RUBENS BARRICHELLO | ACELERADOS
